column17:
The Proton PHC 600 measures the maximum UV intensity using the UV sensor. It allows the user to input the SPF factor. The UV meter will then automatically calculate the allowed sun exposure time and extent. In the case of excessive exposure the alarm function will give a beeping sound. The user can then take further precautionary measures to prevent skin from over exposure to UV rays.

Features
  • Brand: Proton
  • Category: Appliances
  • Product Type: UV Meter
  • Design: Anti-splashing and anti-slip design
  • Modes of Reading: 3 key modes to read UVI SPF and SED
  • Display: LCD
  • Sun Exposure Display Range : 0%-200%
  • Temperature Measuring Range: 0 Degree C-50 Degree C
  • Power Source: CR2032 (3V lithium battery)
  • Warning Alarm: Beeps when sun exposure exceeds 100%
  • Clock : In-built

Note: 1 year manufacturer's warranty. All products sold on Yebhi are brand new and 100% genuine.
